definition: to hang or suspend (from a hook etc)/to hang up (the phone)/(of a line) to be dead/to be worried or concerned/to make a phone call (dialect)/to register or record/classifier for sets or clusters of objects/(slang) to kill/to die/to be finished/to fail (an exam)

sentences.english: Long streamers hung from the tops of tall buildings.
sentences.chinese: 長幅標語從高高的樓頂上垂掛下來。

sentences.english: One of my dreams is to do a one-arm pullup.
sentences.chinese: 我的夢想之一是單手垂掛。

sentences.english: A black serpent, draped overher hand.
sentences.chinese: 聽診器垂掛在她手中，就像一條黑色的大蛇。

sentences.english: This rhodium-plated ring features a heart in Black Diamond crystal. It is the perfect accessory for your keys.
sentences.chinese: 鍍白金色鑰匙招垂掛着一顆黑鑽石色水晶心。

sentences.english: With anguish moist and fever dew.
They were skillfully layered with a hip-slung apron, which literally looked like a pleated apron drooped to the side.
sentences.chinese: 裙子運用垂掛在髖部的褶皺圍裙巧妙地分層。

sentences.english: The cape flowed from his shoulders.
sentences.chinese: 斗篷披垂掛在他的肩上。

sentences.english: Climbing plants with their bright flowers hung over plants on the garden wall.
sentences.chinese: 攀緣植物長着鮮豔的花朵，垂掛在花園的牆上。
